actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act.

summary.text: States that nothing defining an unfair labor practice under the National Labor Relations Act shall be construed to prohibit any strike or refusal to perform services by janitors or custodians, or any inducement of any individual employed by any person as a janitor or custodian to strike or refuse to perform services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act.
